data.comment: Today's referee, Bas Nijhuis, has blown to start the match.
Dusan Tadic is on target to give Ajax a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 20, Great play from Sean Klaiber to set up the goal.
Goal! Ajax increase their lead to 0-2 through a well-placed header from Klaas-Jan Huntelaar.
Daley Blind with an assist there.
In the minute 30, It's now 0-3 in Den Haag as Zakaria Labyad scores for Ajax.
That's a fine assist from Antony Santos.
Goal! Klaas-Jan Huntelaar extends Ajax lead to 0-4 with a header.
In the minute 32, Antony Santos instrumental with a fine assist.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Erik ten Hag is making the team's first substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Quincy Promes replacing Antony Santos.
Ajax make their second substitution with Lisandro Martinez replacing Ryan Gravenberch.
The away team have replaced Nicolas Tagliafico with Kenneth Taylor. This is the third substitution made today by Erik ten Hag.
In the minute 46, Ruud Brood (Den Haag) is making a first substitution, with Jonathan Mulder replacing Bilal Ould-Chikh.
The home team replace Boy Kemper with Samy Bourard.
Michiel Kramer strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-4 at Cars Jeans Stadion.
In the minute 49, That's a fine assist from Samy Bourard.
David Lennart Philipp is replacing Vicente Besuijen for the home team.
Dante Rigo is on a sub for Pascu for Den Haag.
In the minute 70, Samy Bourard puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-4.
Great play from Michiel Kramer to set up the goal.
Jonas Arweiler is replacing Michiel Kramer for Den Haag at Cars Jeans Stadion.
In the minute 85, Jurgen Ekkelenkamp is replacing Klaas-Jan Huntelaar for Ajax at Cars Jeans Stadion.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-4.
